joinus.open_description:
Join this project full of stimuli and growth opportunities. We can't wait to read your story!

If you are selected, you will be part of the TEDxSapienzaU team for the activities of 2024 and 2025, with immediate inclusion.

Applications are open to all students regularly enrolled in a bachelor's, master's, master's, doctorate or specialization school at Sapienza University of Rome and will close on <3>07/10/2024 at 23:59.

Fill out the form to join us!

The outcome of the application will be communicated via institutional email.

For <1>any doubts or clarifications you can contact us by sending an email to: <2>info@tedxsapienzau.com.
joinus.ERS: The External Relations & Sponsorship team deals with managing every aspect related to sponsorships, partnerships, sponsorships and public tenders. So starting from the search for companies, startups, SMEs, media, associations, entities and institutions, up to the signing of agreements and contracts, with a focus on managing the relationship in all its phases, in order to give life to a win-win collaboration. TEDxSapienzaU is a non-profit organization and these funds are entirely used to finance the realization of the project.
joinus.PEM: The Planning and Event Management team deals with the planning and management of various aspects of the organization. In practice, it deals with requesting quotes from companies, finding spaces for conferences and events with sponsors, promoting them through days dedicated to Sapienza students. In essence, therefore, it deals with the ideation, design and development of the various events signed TEDxSapienzaU.
joinus.SEC: The Speakers & Event Curation team deals with the proposals of the themes for the various events, the choice of speakers and the care of their bureaucratic (e.g. email and contacts) and practical (e.g. slides and speech) details. In general, therefore, it takes care of the relationship with the speakers 360° so that there is always a strong attention to all their needs.
joinus.HRA: The Human Resources & Academy team deals with the selection (e.g. construction and screening of applications, introductory interviews) and management of the members of the organization in order to guarantee their well-being and to build a creative and productive environment. It also deals with the training of associates through the organization of masterclasses created and presented by internal and external members.
joinus.IT: The IT & Website team is responsible for ensuring the correct functioning of the official website  both front-end and back-end and manages the official web app. It also coordinates the weekly newsletter and takes care of graphic design, visual identity and content, ensuring an optimal online user experience. Finally, it supervises the technical direction during all major events, playing a 360° support role in the technological field.
joinus.CEM: The Communication & Marketing team takes care of the entire communication of TEDxSapienzaU. In particular, it deals with building and planning online reputation, awareness and creating campaigns and initiatives to engage the public and the realities that support the project. It also deals, in the various phases of the event, with writing press releases, newsletters and email marketing. But also articles for the blog, both internal and for our partners, such as the Millionaire magazine. Finally, it takes care of creating visual, photographic and video content so that the messages communicated are as effective as possible.
joinus.LA: The Legal & Administrative team takes care of the legal and administrative aspects related to the organization of TEDxSapienzaU events. In particular, it deals with drafting contracts, accounting, searching for tenders for fund recovery, compliance with TEDx rules and University guidelines and finally with the protection of privacy and copyright.
joinus.DESIGN: The Design team takes care of the design aspects of the event. In detail, it works on creating a visual and graphic identity, developing products and designing the setups.

mission.ted: TED is a nonprofit organization dedicated to spreading ideas in the form of short, powerful talks (18 minutes or less). TED began in 1984 as a conference where technology, entertainment, and design converged, and today covers nearly every topic from science to business to global issues, in more than 100 languages. Its goal is to spread and champion powerful ideas that will change the world.
mission.tedx: In order to broaden the diffusion of valuable ideas, TED has created a specific program, TEDx, that is, local events organized independently but always with the spirit of a real TED conference, which in fact grants its own license.
mission.tedxsapienzau1: It is the University TEDx of the Sapienza University of Rome, it enjoys the official license granted by the TED Foundation and the support of the Rector Antonella Polimeni together with the Research Support and Technology Transfer Area. The event, born in 2021 from the stimulus of some students of the University, has now reached its third edition. Organized solely by students and PhD students of the first Roman University, thanks to the recognized association
mission.tedxsapienzau2: with the aim of creating ever new and international programming for the entire academic community.

event_leadthechange.title: THEME OF THE EVENT
event_leadthechange.description: The title of the first edition of TEDxSapienzaU was <1>ACT - Lead the change</1>. As per the TEDx guidelines, the dialogues that were presented concerned various interconnected subjects and thematic areas, favoring the best ideas and experiences inspiring:
event_leadthechange.A: The culture of action against the culture of inertia and the role of active citizenship in the education of the future.
event_leadthechange.C: The predisposition for creativity and empathy, pop education and the new horizons of contamination between knowledge.
event_leadthechange.T: Digital and integrated reality, the transformation of educational models and the value of experience in the growth of the individual.

event_backtozero.title: OUR OBJECTIVE
event_backtozero.description: Our goal is to <1>reset</1>, seek a point <1>zero</1>: inequalities, conflicts, bad lifestyles, emissions and waste. Reduce those factors pollutants that slow down the growth of our society, worsening the quality of our life <1>Reconsider ourselves </1> and our way of dealing with contemporary society, with the <1>arts</1 > and the <1>sciences</1>. It is fundamental to build a world where human beings can '<1>be reborn</1>', thriving and expressing themselves to the fullest in every discipline foundations for <1>to be reborn</1>, to become better people in a better place.
event_backtozero.citation: Man and the world around him are not separate tracks, but rails that move together, they need each other.

event_paradoxa.title: PARA DOXA
event_paradoxa.description: From the Greek παράδοξος, compound of παρα- meaning 'against' and δόξα meaning 'opinion.' Going against the common way of thinking. The history of paradoxes is ancient, dating back to the origins of logic. However, while the first paradoxes were more like mind games, modernity has given rise to new ones within the reality that surrounds us. Justice creates inequality, opportunities that create laziness, conflicts to bring peace. Just as ancient thinkers developed paradoxes to stimulate reflection, we too must face, not avoid, the paradoxes that permeate the nature of the human world in order to sprout ideas that can improve it. PARA DOXA will be the fertile ground to cultivate them.

sapienzau.chi_siamo_des: SapienzaU is a student association officially recognized by Sapienza University of Rome, founded in 2024 and active as TEDxSapienzaU committee since 2021. With more than 110 members from almost all university departments, our goal is building a multidisciplinary and welcoming community, with a strong focus on communication and collective growth.
sapienzau.cosa_facciamo_des: Our goal is organizing educational and formative events which enhance the university experience. Ispired by TED priciples, SapienzaU offers quality contents, organizing ventures which promote civic activistm, diversity and communication.
sapienzau.i_nostri_valori_des: as the statute explains it, SapienzaU is indipendent from any political and ideological movement and it's only focus is on educational and cultural purposes. Our guidelines guarantees an inclusive space, where every student can found inspiration and strenght to grow as a person and as part of our university community.
